allQuestion.explanation: Do you drive people crazy with your inconsiderate ways, or get the prize for politeness?

answers.text: Answer it, keep it brief, and refuse to talk about anything private.
Silence your ringtone and let the call go to voice mail.
Only take the call if it's someone you really want to talk to.

allQuestion.text: You're on public transit and receive a personal phone call. What do you do?

allQuestion.explanation: Do you drive people crazy with your inconsiderate ways, or get the prize for politeness?

answers.text: Gambling, slacking off at work, and/or being selfish.
Smoking, drinking, drugs, and/or eating junk food.
Swearing, poor manners, and/or being messy.
I don't have any of these vices.

allQuestion.text: Which one of these vices are you guilty of?

allQuestion.explanation: Do you drive people crazy with your inconsiderate ways, or get the prize for politeness?

answers.text: Your social networking, blog readers, and/or entire e-list.
Friends, family, co-workers... people you interact with face-to-face.

allQuestion.text: Something really bad or really good happens to you. Who do you tell about it?
